languages.text: "Я слышал, Арбитес продлили союз с династией фон Валанциус. Полагаю, в секторе, где правят Вольные Торговцы, без подобной поддержки не обойтись. Однако в подобной ситуации и с учетом всех прав, дарованных священным Патентом, может быть сложно различить, служите вы Лексу или уже конкретной личности".

traits.locale_text: "Да свершится суд, проктор Антар. Союз представителя Адептус Арбитес и Вольного Торговца — нетипичный случай. Он либо взаимовыгоден, либо носит надзирательный характер... Впрочем, не отвечайте, я уважаю клятвы о неразглашении".
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."
languages.original_text: "Я слышал, Арбитес продлили союз с династией фон Валанциус. Полагаю, в секторе, где правят Вольные Торговцы, без подобной поддержки не обойтись. Однако в подобной ситуации и с учетом всех прав, дарованных священным Патентом, может быть сложно различить, служите вы Лексу или уже конкретной личности".

"I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."

languages.text: "Es heißt, das Adeptus Arbites hat seine Allianz mit der Dynastie derer von Valancius erneuert. Ich nehme an, in einem von Freihändlern beherrschten Sektor käme man andernfalls nicht weit. Angesichts dieser Umstände und unter Berücksichtigung all der Rechte, die der heilige Handelsbrief gewährt, fällt es Euch aber möglicherweise schwer, zu unterscheiden, ob ihr tatsächlich dem Lex oder einer bestimmten Person dient."
languages.original_text: "I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."

traits.locale_text: "Es heißt, das Adeptus Arbites hat seine Allianz mit der Dynastie derer von Valancius erneuert. Ich nehme an, in einem von Freihändlern beherrschten Sektor käme man andernfalls nicht weit. Angesichts dieser Umstände und unter Berücksichtigung all der Rechte, die der heilige Handelsbrief gewährt, fällt es Euch aber möglicherweise schwer, zu unterscheiden, ob ihr tatsächlich dem Lex oder einer bestimmten Person dient."

languages.text: « J'ai entendu dire que l'Adeptus Arbites avait renouvelé son alliance avec la dynastie von Valancius. J'imagine que c'est une nécessité dans un secteur sous le contrôle des libres-marchands. Cependant, dans de telles circonstances et compte tenu des droits conférés par lettre de marque sacrée, vous pourriez avoir du mal à déterminer si vous servez effectivement la Lex ou un individu particulier. »
languages.original_text: "I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu dire que l'Adeptus Arbites avait renouvelé son alliance avec la dynastie von Valancius. J'imagine que c'est une nécessité dans un secteur sous le contrôle des libres-marchands. Cependant, dans de telles circonstances et compte tenu des droits conférés par lettre de marque sacrée, vous pourriez avoir du mal à déterminer si vous servez effectivement la Lex ou un individu particulier. »

languages.text: “我听说，法务部与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝重新缔结了盟约。在这种由众多行商浪人主宰的星区里，若是失去了行商浪人的支持，恐怕走不了太远。不过在这样的情况下，考虑到神圣授状赋予的权力，有时真的很难区分法务官侍奉的究竟是帝国律法，还是某个特定人员的利益。”
languages.original_text: "I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."

traits.locale_text: “我听说，法务部与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝重新缔结了盟约。在这种由众多行商浪人主宰的星区里，若是失去了行商浪人的支持，恐怕走不了太远。不过在这样的情况下，考虑到神圣授状赋予的权力，有时真的很难区分法务官侍奉的究竟是帝国律法，还是某个特定人员的利益。”

languages.text: «He oído que el Adeptus Arbites ha renovado su alianza con la dinastía von Valancius. Imagino que es necesaria en un sector gobernado por Comerciantes Independientes. No obstante, bajo tales circunstancias, y considerando todos los derechos que otorga la sagrada Patente, puede hacerse difícil distinguir si está sirviendo a la Lex o, a efectos prácticos, a una persona en concreto».
languages.original_text: "I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."

traits.locale_text: «He oído que el Adeptus Arbites ha renovado su alianza con la dinastía von Valancius. Imagino que es necesaria en un sector gobernado por Comerciantes Independientes. No obstante, bajo tales circunstancias, y considerando todos los derechos que otorga la sagrada Patente, puede hacerse difícil distinguir si está sirviendo a la Lex o, a efectos prácticos, a una persona en concreto».

languages.text: 「高等裁定局がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝との同盟を更新したと聞いた。ローグトレーダーが支配するこの星域では、同盟なしに遠くまで進むことはできないだろう。だが、このような状況下では、それに聖なる令状によって与えられたあらゆる権利を考慮すると、お前が本当にレックスに仕えているのか、それとも実際はある特定の人物に仕えているのかを見極めるのは難しくなるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝との同盟を更新したと聞いた。ローグトレーダーが支配するこの星域では、同盟なしに遠くまで進むことはできないだろう。だが、このような状況下では、それに聖なる令状によって与えられたあらゆる権利を考慮すると、お前が本当にレックスに仕えているのか、それとも実際はある特定の人物に仕えているのかを見極めるのは難しくなるかもしれない」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites'in von Valancius hanedanlığıyla olan ittifakını yenilediğini duydum. Hür Tacir'in hüküm sürdüğü sektörde onun izni olmadan pek bir şey yapılamıyor demek ki. Mevcut koşullar ve Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin bahşetti haklar göz önüne alındığında gerçekten Lex'e mi yoksa aslında belirli bir kişiye mi hizmet ettiğini ayırt etmekte zorlanabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "I heard the Adeptus Arbites had renewed their alliance with the von Valancius dynasty. One would not get far without it in a sector ruled by Rogue Traders, I imagine. However, under such circumstances, and considering all the rights granted by the sacred Warrant, you may struggle to distinguish whether you are indeed serving the Lex or, in fact, a particular person."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites'in von Valancius hanedanlığıyla olan ittifakını yenilediğini duydum. Hür Tacir'in hüküm sürdüğü sektörde onun izni olmadan pek bir şey yapılamıyor demek ki.
